lore: A Brotherhood Champion acts as an exemplar of martial prowess to which all Grey Knights aspire. He is a warrior of peerless skill who mentors new recruits in the ways of the blade. Upon the battlefield, he defends the lives of others and upholds the honour of his brotherhood with deadly skill.

otherAbilities.name: Martial Fury:
otherAbilities.description: Each time this model makes a melee attack that targets a Character unit, you can re-roll the Hit roll and you can re-roll the Wound roll .

otherAbilities.name: Ethereal Castigation (Psychic):
otherAbilities.description: While this model is leading a unit, models in that unit have the Fights First ability.
